German PER
farm O

to O

mutton O
. O
BONN PER
1996-08-22 PER
Germany PER
' O
s O
Agriculture PER
Ministry PER
suggested O
on O

that O

avoid O
eating O
meat O
from O
British O

until O

whether O

can O
be O

to O
the O
animals O
. O
" O

this O
is O
cleared O
up O
by O
the O
European LOC
Union LOC
' O
s O
scientific O
panels O
-- O
and O

have O

to O

as O

as O
possible O
-- O
( O
consumers O
) O
should O
if O
at O
all O
possible O
give O

to O
sheepmeat O
from O
other O
countries O
, O
" O
ministry O
official O
Werner MISC
Zwingmann MISC
told O
ZDF O

. O
" O
I O
do O
not O
want O
to O
say O
that O

is O
a O
concrete O

for O

, O
" O

added O
. O
" O

are O
too O
many O
holes O
in O
what O
we O
know O
, O
and O
these O
must O
be O
filled O
very O

. O
" O
Bonn LOC
has O
led O
efforts O
to O
ensure O
consumer O
protection O
tops O
the O
list O
of O
priorities O
in O
dealing O
with O
the O
mad O
cow O
crisis O
, O
which O
erupted O
in O
March O
when O
Britain LOC
acknowledged O
humans O
could O
contract O
a O
similar O
illness O
by O
eating O
contaminated O
beef O
. O
The O
European O
Commission O
agreed O
this O
month O
to O
rethink O
a O
proposal O
to O
ban O
the O
use O
of O
suspect O
sheep O
tissue O
after O
some O
EU LOC
veterinary O
experts O
questioned O
whether O
it O
was O
justified O
. O
EU MISC
Farm MISC
Commissioner MISC
Franz PER
Fischler PER
had O
proposed O
banning O
sheep O
brains O
, O
spleens O
and O
spinal O
cords O
from O
the O
human O
and O
animal O
food O
chains O
after O
reports O
from O
Britain LOC
and O
France ORG
that O
under O
laboratory O
conditions O
sheep O
could O
contract O
Bovine LOC
Spongiform LOC
Encephalopathy LOC
( O
BSE O
) O
-- O
mad O
cow O
disease O
. O
But O
some O
members O
of O
the O
EU O
' O
s O
standing O
veterinary O
committee O
questioned O
whether O
the O
action O
was O
necessary O
given O
the O
slight O
risk O
to O
human O
health O
. O
The O
question O
is O
being O
studied O
separately O
by O
two O
EU O
scientific O
committees O
. O
Sheep O
have O
long O
been O
known O
to O
contract O
scrapie O
, O
a O
similar O
brain-wasting O
disease O
to O
BSE O
which O
is O
believed O
to O
have O
been O
transferred O
to O
cattle O
through O
feed O
containing O
animal O
waste O
. O
British O
officials O
say O
sheep O
meat O
is O
perfectly O
safe O
to O
eat O
. O
ZDF MISC
said O
Germany LOC
imported O
47,600 O
sheep O
from O
Britain LOC
last O
year O
, O
nearly O
half O
of O
total O
imports O
. O
It O
brought O
in O
4,275 O
tonnes O
of O
British O
mutton O
, O
some O
10 O
percent O
of O
overall O
imports O
. O
After O
the O
British O
government O
admitted O
a O
possible O
link O
between O
mad O
cow O
disease O
and O
its O
fatal O
human O
equivalent O
, O
the O
EU O
imposed O
a O
worldwide O
ban O
on O
British O
beef O
exports O
. O
EU O

agreed O

a O

in O

to O

of O
the O
ban O
as O

takes O

to O

the O
disease O
. O

. O

of O

of O

' O
s O
disease O
, O

, O

. O

of O
four O

born O
to O

who O
caught O
measles O
developed O
serious O
cases O
of O
Crohn PER
' O
s O
disease O
, O
the O

said O
. O
Dr PER
Andrew PER
Wakefield PER
of O

Royal MISC
Free MISC
Hospital MISC
School MISC
of MISC
Medicine MISC
and O

, O
between O
1940 O

" O

' O
s O

" O

' O

. O

. O

Garlic O
pills O
do O
n't O
lower O
cholesterol O
, O
study O
finds O
. O
LONDON LOC
1996-08-22 O
Garlic O
pills O
may O
not O
lower O
blood O
cholesterol O
and O
studies O
that O
show O
they O
do O
may O
be O
flawed O
, O
British O
researchers O
have O
reported O
. O
A O
study O
by O
a O
team O
of O
doctors O
at O
Oxford LOC
University LOC
has O
found O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
do O
not O
benefit O
significantly O
from O
taking O
garlic O
tablets O
. O
The O
study O
involved O
115 O
people O
with O
high MISC
blood MISC
cholesterol O
levels O
. O
They O
were O
given O
900 O
milligrams O
a O
day O
of O
dried O
garlic O
powder O
or O
placebo O
tablets O
. O
" O
There O
were O
no O
significant O
differences O
between O
the O
groups O
receiving O
garlic O
and O
placebo O
, O
" O
they O
wrote O
in O
the O
Journal O
of O
the O
Royal LOC
College LOC
of O
Physicians PER
. O
Those O
taking O
part O
were O
told O
to O
eat O
a O
low-fat O
diet O
for O
six O
weeks O
before O
they O
started O
taking O
the O
pills O
, O
and O
their O
blood O
cholesterol O
measured O
before O
and O
after O
the O
six-week O
period O
. O
The O
researchers O
said O
this O
would O
make O
their O
findings O
more O
accurate O
. O
Several O
studies O
have O
found O
garlic O
pills O
can O
lower O
blood O
pressure O
and O
blood O
cholesterol O
. O
But O
the O
Oxford LOC
team O
disputed O
these O
findings O
and O
said O
either O
previous O
trials O
may O
have O
been O
interpreted O
incorrectly O
, O
those O
taking O
part O
were O
not O
given O
special O
diets O
beforehand O
or O
the O
duration O
of O
the O
studies O
may O
have O
been O
too O
short O
. O
The O
six-month O
trial O
was O
funded O
by O
the O
British O
Heart O
Foundation O
and O
Lichtwer O
Pharma O
GmbH O
, O
which O
makes O
Kwai O
brand O
garlic O
tablets O
. O
The O
study O
did O
not O
address O
whether O
whole O
garlic O
could O
affect O
cholesterol O
. O
-- O
London MISC
Newsroom MISC

542 O

long-term O
effects O
of O
fiscal O
consolidation O
are O
clearly O
positive O
, O
with O
higher O

to O

by O
raising O
investment O
and O
lowering O
long-term O
real O
interest O
rates O
, O
" O

RBA O
said O
. O

Ukraine LOC
hails O
peace O
as O
marks O
five-year O
independence O
. O
Rostislav O
Khotin MISC
KIEV MISC
1996-08-23 O
Ukraine LOC
celebrates O
five O
years O
of O
independence O
from O
Kremlin MISC
rule O
on O
Saturday O
, O
hailing O
civil O
and O
inter-ethnic O
peace O
as O
its O
main O
post-Soviet O
achievement O
. O
Ukraine LOC
' O
s O
declaration O
of O
independence O
in O
1991 O
, O
backed O
nine-to-one O
by O
a O
referendum O
in O
December O
of O
that O
year O
, O
effectively O
dealt O
a O
death O
blow O
to O
the O
Soviet O
empire O
and O
ended O
more O
than O
three O
centuries O
of O
rule O
from O
Moscow LOC
. O
Ukraine LOC
, O
with O
a O
Russian O
community O
of O
11 O
million O
people O
-- O
the O
world O
' O
s O
largest O
outside O
Russia LOC
-- O
has O
avoided O
conflicts O
like O
those O
in O
Russia LOC
' O
s O
Chechnya O
, O
neighbouring ORG
Moldova ORG
, O
and O
the O
former O
Soviet O
republics O
of O
Georgia LOC
, O
Azerbaijan LOC
and O
Tajikistan LOC
. O
" O
Ukraine LOC
' O
s O
biggest O
achievements O
for O
five O
years O
are O
the O
preservation O
of O
civil O
peace O
and O
inter-ethnic O
harmony O
, O
" O
President PER
Leonid PER
Kuchma PER
said O
in O
televised O
statement O
this O
week O
. O
" O
Unlike PER
many O
other O
post-Soviet O
countries O
we O
were O
able O
to O
deal O
with O
conflict O
situations O
in O
a O
peaceful O
and O
civilised O
way O
. O
" O
But O
independence LOC
was O
initially O
accompanied O
by O
hyper-inflation O
and O
economic O
collapse O
, O
although O
there O
are O
signs O
of O
a O
turnaround O
. O
Inflation O
-- O
a O
hyper-inflationary O
10,300 O
percent O
a O
year O
in O
1993 O
-- O
was O
a O
respectable O
0.1 O
percent O
a O
month O
in O
June O
and O
July O
and O
the O
economy O
has O
just O
begun O
to O
grow O
. O
Kuchma PER
told O
a O
solemn O
ceremony O
at O
the O
Ukraina LOC
Palace LOC
on O
Friday O
that O
" O
there O
was O
a O
turning O
point O
" O
in O
reforms O
and O
that O
he O
expected O
a O
rise O
in O
the O
standard O
of O
living O
in O
the O
near O
future O
. O
" O
There O
is O
no O
doubt O
that O
economic O
growth O
has O
already O
started O
, O
" O
said O
Adelbert ORG
Knobl ORG
, O
head O
of O
the O
International MISC
Monetary MISC
Fund MISC
' O
s O
mission O
in O
Ukraine LOC
. O
" O
The O
national O
bank O
and O
the O
government O
have O
every O
reason O
to O
be O
proud O
of O
their O
efforts O
. O
" O
Central PER
bank PER
officials PER
said O
on O
Thursday O
that O
a O
much-postponed O
hryvna O
currency O
would O
" O
definitely O
" O
be O
introduced O
before O
the O
end O
of O
this O
year O
. O
It O
will O
replace O
the O
interim O
karbovanets O
currency O
, O
which O
was O
introduced O
at O
par O
to O
the O
Russian O
rouble O
in O
1992 O
but O
now O
trades O
at O
almost O
33 O
karbovanets O
per O
rouble O
. O
Ukraine LOC
has O
repeatedly O
promised O
to O
introduce O
the O
hryvna O
but O
had O
to O
postpone O
the O
plans O
because O
of O
economic O
problems O
. O
Proud O
of O
its O
record O
in O
promptly O
joining O
both O
the O
Council O
of O
Europe LOC
and O
NATO PER
' O
s O
Partnership O
for O
Peace PER
, O
Ukraine LOC
caused O
a O
foreign O
policy O
wrangle O
this O
week O
, O
offending O
China LOC
by O
allowing O
a O
Taiwanese O
minister O
to O
appear O
on O
a O
public O
, O
if O
unofficial O
visit O
. O
China LOC
cancelled O
a O
visit O
by O
a O
top-level O
delegation O
in O
protest O
. O
Kiev O
' O
s O
Foreign O
Minister PER
Hennady PER
Udovenko PER
said O
Beijing LOC
was O
overreacting O
. O
But O
Ukraine LOC
, O
seeing O
itself O
as O
a O
bridge O
between O
Russia PER
and O
the O
rapidly O
Westernising O

1996-08-23 O

that O
will O
allow O

Corp ORG
' O
s O
American ORG

to O
operate O
three O

flights O
between O
New LOC
York LOC
and O
Bogota LOC
, O
the O

of O

said O
Friday O
. O
Under O
the O
agreement O
, O
which O
followed O

in O

this O
week O
, O

also O
will O
be O
allowed O
to O
shift O
up O
to O
four O
of O

weekly O

it O
now O
operates O
between O
Miami LOC
and O
Colombia LOC
to O
its O
New LOC
York LOC
gateway O
. O

United LOC
States LOC
also O
will O
be O
able O
to O
designate O
one O

for O
service O
between O

two O

after O
two O

. O

) O

under O

' O

. O

has O

Adventurers O

. O
PEMBERTON O
, O

1996-08-24 O
About O

set O

) O

. O

, O

' O
ll O

, O
" O

. O
Michael PER

, O

The O

' O

, O

CRICKET PER
- O
RUN-OUT O
GIVES O
LEWIS PER
AND O
ENGLAND PER
SLIM PER
SATISFACTION O
. O
LONDON LOC
1996-08-25 O
Chris PER
Lewis PER
did O
his O
best O
to O
forget O
his O
controversial O
omission O
from O
the O
England LOC
one-day O
squad O
on O
Sunday O
but O
could O
not O
prevent O
Pakistan LOC
reasserting O
their O
dominance O
in O
the O
final O
test O
at O
The LOC
Oval LOC
. O
A O
super O
piece O
of O
fielding O
by O
Lewis PER
, O
dropped O
as O
a O
disciplinary O
measure O
after O
arriving O
only O
35 O
minutes O
before O
the O
start O
on O
the O
fourth O
morning O
, O
provided O
the O
only O
bright O
spot O
for O
England PER
as O
the O
touring O
team O
batted O
on O
to O
reach O
413 O
for O
five O
at O
the O
interval O
, O
a O
lead O
of O
87 O
. O
The O
solitary O
wicket O
to O
fall O
was O
Asif PER
Mujtaba PER
, O
run O
out O
for O
13 O
attempting O
a O
second O
run O
to O
third O
man O
where O
Lewis PER
was O
lurking O
with O
a O
point O
to O
prove O
. O
There O
seemed O
scant O
danger O
until O
the O
Surrey LOC
player O
swooped O
on O
to O
the O
ball O
and O
returned O
off O
balance O
to O
county O
team O
mate O
Alec PER
Stewart PER
who O
whipped O
off O
the O
bails O
. O
Lewis PER
, O
though O
, O
could O
not O
make O
similar O
waves O
with O
the O
ball O
as O
Salim O
Malik PER
and O
Wasim PER
Akram PER
batted O
through O
the O
rest O
of O
the O
session O
with O
few O
alarms O
. O
Wasim O
rattled O
along O
to O
30 O
not O
out O
, O
outscoring O
his O
partner O
who O
was O
unbeaten O
on O
24 O
at O
the O
break O
, O
although O
the O
weather O
was O
again O
threatening O
to O
play O
the O
dominant O
role O
. O
Rain O
arrived O
just O
as O
the O
players O
left O
the O
field O
for O
lunch O
, O
forcing O
the O
ground-staff O
into O
action O
yet O
again O
. O

delayed O

for O
over O

) O

- O
SEYCHELLES LOC
FAIL O

. O
Mark PER
Gleeson PER
JOHANNESBURG O
1996-08-26 O

tiny O

of O

Seychelles LOC
failed O
to O
make O
soccer O
history O
at O
the O
weekend O
when O
they O
bowed O
out O
of O
the O
preliminary O
rounds O
of O
the O
African MISC
Nations MISC
Cup MISC
. O
Trailing O
fellow O
Indian LOC
Ocean LOC
islanders O
Mauritius LOC
1-0 O
from O
the O
first O
leg O
, O
they O
were O
held O
to O
a O
1-1 O
draw O
at O
home O
on O
Saturday O
despite O
playing O
against O
10 O
men O
for O
most O
of O
the O
match O
. O

2-1 O
aggregate O
took O

into O

group O
phase O
of O
the O
qualifiers O
for O
the O
1998 O

SWIMMING O
- O
POPOV O
IN O
`SERIOUS O
CONDITION O
' O
AFTER O
STABBING O
. O
MOSCOW O
1996-08-26 O
Russian O
double O
Olympic O
swimming O
champion O
Alexander PER
Popov PER
was O
in O
a O
serious O
condition O
on O
Monday O
after O
being O
stabbed O
on O
a O
Moscow O
street O
. O
A O
doctor O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
say O
whether O
Popov O
, O
the O
only O
man O
to O
retain O
the O
Olympic ORG
50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
titles O
, O
would O
return O
to O
top-level O
sport O
. O
" O
His O
condition O
is O
serious O
, O
" O
said O
Rimma PER
Maslova PER
, O
deputy O
chief O
doctor O
of O
Hospital O
No O
31 O
in O
the O
Russian PER
capital O
. O
" O
But O
he O
is O
conscious O
and O
is O
talking O
and O
smiling O
. O
" O
Maslova PER
told O
Reuters O
she O
was O
not O
an O
expert O
in O
sports O
medicine O
, O
but O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
judge MISC
Popov MISC
' O
s O
chances O
of O
returning O
to O
competitive O
swimming O
. O
Popov O
, O
who O
won O
gold O
in O
the O
50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
at O
the O
recent O
Atlanta LOC
Olympics LOC
, O
was O
stabbed O
in O
the O
abdomen O
late O
on O
Saturday O
after O
an O
argument O
with O
a O
group O
of O
roadside O
watermelon O
sellers O
in O
south-west O
Moscow LOC
. O
Maslova O
said O
the O
wound O
had O
affected O
a O
lung O
and O
a O
kidney O
. O
Doctors O
operated O
on O
Popov O
, O
24 O
, O
for O
three O
hours O
. O
Popov O
told O

on O
Sunday O

was O
in O
no O

and O
promised O

would O
be O
back O
in O

pool O
shortly O
. O
" O

' O

no O
need O
to O
worry O
. O

' O

going O
to O
be O
walking O
soon O
-- O
and O
swimming O
, O
" O
he O
insisted O

intensive O
care O
unit O
. O

had O

. O

Russia LOC
' O

top O
award O
for O

. O

" O

. PER

- O

, O

. O
1996-08-26 O
Lamonts O

Inc O
, O

of O

. O
( O
Corrects O
to O

been O
filed O
) O
. O
The O

plan O
calls O
for O

to O

paid O
in O
full O
. O

, O

company O

. O

claims O

90 O
million O
. O

to O

9 O

new O
common O
stock O
. O

to O

' O

. O

and O

million O

be O

to O

and O
other O

in O

for O
all O
existing O

of O
the O
company O
. O

four O

' O

. O

OSCE MISC
delays O
decision O
on O
refugee O
voting O
. O
Kurt PER
Schork PER
SARAJEVO PER
1996-08-26 PER
Bosnia PER
' O
s O
election O
organisers O
will O
decide O
on O
Tuesday O
whether O
or O
not O
to O
postpone O

scheduled O
as O
part O
of O

, O

spokeswoman O
said O
on O
Monday O
. O
Officials O
from O
the O
Organisation O
for O
Security O
and O
Cooperation O
in O
Europe LOC
( O
OSCE MISC
) O
are O
considering O
the O
postponement O
following O
allegations O
of O
serious O
irregularities O
in O
the O
registration O
of O
Serb PER
refugees O
. O
International O

say O
the O
alleged O
irregularities O
could O
affect O
the O
outcome O
of O
voting O
for O
municipal O
assemblies O
. O
" O
Tomorrow O
... O
the O
Provisional MISC
Election MISC
Commission MISC
will O
consider O
the O
possible O
postponement O
of O
municipal O
elections O
only O
... O
the O
other O
elections O
will O
be O
held O
on O
September O
14 O
, O
" O
OSCE O
spokeswoman O
Agota PER
Kuperman PER
told O
reporters O
in O

. O
" O
I O
think O
that O

would O
be O
very O
difficult O
to O
select O
which O

elections O
would O

to O

. O
I O
think O
probably O

( O
to O

) O
were O
to O
be O
taken O
it O
would O
probably O
be O
all O
municipal O
elections O
.. O
. O
" O
Kuperman PER
added O
that O
options O
other O
than O
postponement O
were O
also O
on O
the O
table O
, O
but O
she O
refused O
to O
specify O
what O
they O
were O
. O
The O
Dayton LOC
peace O
agreement O
gave O
the O
OSCE O
a O
mandate O
to O
organise O
Bosnian O
elections O
. O
The MISC
Provisional MISC
Election MISC
Commission MISC
is MISC
OSCE MISC
' O
s O
top O
rule-making O
body O
for O
the O
poll O
. O
More O
than O
600,000 O
refugees O
have O
registered O
to O
vote O
in O
55 O
countries O
around O
the O
world O
, O
representing O
about O
20 O
per O
cent O
of O
Bosnia PER
' O
s O
total O
electorate O
. O
They O
are O
due O
to O
begin O
voting O
on O
Wednesday O
, O
August O
28 O
, O
just O
one O
day O
after O
the O
PEC O
is O
supposed O
to O
make O
its O
decision O
. O
Balloting PER
inside PER
Bosnia PER
is O
scheduled O
for O
September O
14 O
, O
when O
citizens O
are O
slated O
to O
elect O
municipal O
and O

assemblies O
, O
separate O
Moslem-Croat O
and O
Serb PER
parliaments PER
, O
a O
national O
House PER
of PER
Representatives PER
and O
a O

Presidency O
. O
A O
Sarajevo O
daily O
newspaper O
, O
Dnevi MISC
Avaz MISC
, O
which O
is O
close O
to O
Bosnia PER
' O
s O
Moslem O
nationalist O
SDA O
party O
, O

Monday O
said O
the O
OSCE O
would O
postpone O
the O

of O
1997 O
because O
of O
the O

. O
SDA O
has O
a O

. O
" O
I O
do O
n't O

what O
the O

of O
festivities O
as O
good-natured O
. O
Around O
400 O
police O
were O
wounded O
in O
riots O
in O
1976 O
when O
the O
carnival O
, O
now O
in O
its O
31st O
year O
, O
acquired O
its O
darker O
reputation O
from O
which O
it O
is O
now O
only O
slowly O
recovering O
. O
Shopkeepers O
still O
board O
up O
their O
windows O
and O
many O
residents O
leave O
town O
for O
the O
weekend O
, O
but O
for O
four O
or O
five O
years O
there O
has O
been O
no O
disorder O
and O
relatively O
little O
crime O
. O

SEC MISC
adopts O
rules O
to O
improve O
investor O
access O
to O
best O
stock O
prices O
. O
WASHINGTON O
1996-08-28 O
The O
Securities O
and O
Exchange O
Commission O
Wednesday O
approved O
rules O
designed O
to O
give O
stock O
market O
investors O
a O
better O
chance O
at O
getting O
the O
best O
price O
available O
for O
their O
orders O
. O
The O
so-called O
order O
handling O
rules O
, O
which O
were O
proposed O
last O
September O
, O
were O
approved O
in O
a O
4-0 O
vote O
. O
The O
new O
rules O
will O
require O
specialists O
at O
stock O
exchanges O
and O
market O
makers O
on O
Nasdaq O
to O
allow O
customers O
to O
view O
price O
quotes O
from O
other O
electronic O
trading O
systems O
that O
may O
not O
be O
readily O
available O
to O
them O
. O
The O
rules O
will O
also O
require O
that O
customer O
limit O
orders O
be O
displayed O
with O
prices O
better O
than O
those O
available O
in O
quotes O
publicly O
available O
at O
the O
time O
. O
Specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
are O
companies O
or O
individuals O
recognised O
as O
qualified O
to O
maintain O
an O
orderly O
market O
in O
a O
stock O
. O
In O
a O
limit O
order O
, O
investors O
specify O
the O
price O
at O
which O
they O
are O
willing O
to O
buy O
or O
sell O
, O
as O
opposed O
to O
a O
market O
order O
executed O
at O
prevailing O
prices O
. O
" O
These O
rules O
are O
intended O
to O
empower O
all O
investors O
, O
by O
allowing O
their O
orders O
to O
compete O
on O
a O
level O
playing O
field O
, O
and O
by O
providing O
the O
disclosure O
they O
need O
to O
make O
informed O
decisions O
, O
" O
said O
SEC MISC
Chairman MISC
Arthur MISC
Levitt MISC
. MISC
The MISC
SEC MISC
' O
s O
goal O
, O
he O
added O
, O
was O
to O
create O
" O
one O
system O
where O
one O
price O
could O
be O
available O
to O
everybody O
. O
" O
The O
director O
of O
the O
SEC O
' O
s O
division O
of O
market O
regulation O
, O
Richard PER
Lindsey PER
, O
said O
Wall ORG
Street ORG
firms O
will O
probably O
need O
to O
spend O
about O
$ O
7 O
million O
to O
carry O
out O
the O
improvements O
called O
for O
by O
the O
new O
rules O
. O
In O
proposing O
the O
rules O
last O
year O
, O
the O
SEC LOC
noted O
that O
while O
technology O
has O
improved O
, O
commonplace O
practices O
still O
existed O
that O
worked O
against O
investors O
' O
best O
interests O
. O
It O
noted O
that O
customers O
whose O
orders O
were O
not O
displayed O
lost O
the O
chance O
of O
getting O
the O
best O
possible O
price O
available O
in O
the O
market O
. O
It O
also O
cited O
the O
potential O
problem O
of O
a O
two-tiered O
market O
in O
which O
market O
makers O
quote O
one O
price O
to O
public O
investors O
while O
quoting O
better O
prices O
in O
private O
systems O
, O
thus O
robbing O
investors O
without O
access O
to O
" O
hidden O
" O
quotes O
the O
benefit O
of O
the O
best O
available O
prices O
. O
Earlier O
this O
month O
, O
the O
SEC O
settled O
charges O
of O
alleged O
malpractices O
on O
Nasdaq ORG
when O
the O
parent O
of O
the O
Nasdaq O
market O
, O
the PER
National PER
Association PER
of PER
Securities PER
Dealers PER
, O
agreed O
to O
spend O
$ O
100 O
million O
over O
five O
years O
to O
upgrade O
its O
oversight O
of O
brokers O
' O
trading O
practices O
. O
The O
SEC O
dropped O
a O
third O
proposal O
that O
would O
have O
allowed O
investors O
with O
market O
orders O
to O

at O
a O
better O
price O
if O
there O
were O
shifts O
in O
prices O
before O
their O
orders O
were O
executed O
. O
The O
agency O
said O
it O
would O
monitor O
effects O
of O
the O
two O
new O
rules O
before O
considering O
the O
" O
price O
improvement O
" O
proposal O
again O
. O
The O
agency O
also O
proposed O
rule O
changes O
that O
would O
require O
continuous O
" O
bid O
" O
and O
" O
ask O
" O
quotations O
from O
exchange O
specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
who O
trade O
more O
than O
1 O
percent O
of O
a O

during O
any O
quarter O
on O
Nasdaq MISC
. MISC
The MISC

' O
s O

order O

will O
mean O
a O

for O
Nasdaq ORG
, O

. O
The O

PREDICTION LOC
. O
Martin MISC

1996-08-28 MISC
Britain MISC
' O

seconds O
from O
the O

4:19 O
. O

set O
by O

. O

, O

1 MISC
, O

Spanish O
tomato O
warriors O
paint O
the O
town O
red O
. O
BUNOL O
, O
Spain LOC
1996-08-28 O
Revellers O
painted O
the O
town O
red O
on O
Wednesday O
as O
the O
1996 O
edition O
of O
the O
world O
' O
s O
biggest O
tomato O
fight O
began O
in O
the O
eastern O
Spanish MISC
village MISC
of MISC
Bunol MISC
. O
Thousands O
of O
people O
pelted O
each O
other O
with O
armfuls O
of O
ripe O
tomatoes O
as O
streets O
, O
walls O
and O
windows O
were O
coated O
in O
a O
blood-red O
wash O
. O
A O
single O
firework O
after O
midday O
signalled O
the O
start O
of O
the O
fruit-throwing O
frenzy O
, O
during O
which O
participants O
hurl O
some O
100 O
tonnes O
of O
tomatoes O
trucked O
in O
for O
the O
occasion O
. O
Local O

say O
the O
tradition O
began O
in O
1945 O
when O

locals O
began O
spontaneously O
to O
bombard O
the O
priest O
and O
mayor O
at O
the O
annual O

in O
Bunol O
( O
pronounced O
Boo-nee-OL O
) O
. O
The MISC
festival MISC
' O
s O
fame O
has O
grown O
and O
now O
attracts O
between O
15,000 O
and O
20,000 O
people O
, O
many O
of O
them O
foreigners O
. O

Researchers O
report O
progress O
in O
muscular O
dystrophy O
. O
PHILADELPHIA LOC
1996-08-29 O
University ORG
of ORG
Pennsylvania ORG
researchers O
on O
Thursday O
said O
a O
new O
gene-therapy O
technique O
for O
treating O
muscular O
dystrophy O
disease O
had O
shown O
progress O
in O
laboratory O
animals O
. O
Word O
of O
the O
findings O
, O
to O
be O
published O
in O
the O
Oct O
. O
1 O
issue O
of O
the O
journal O
" O
Human MISC
Gene MISC
Therapy MISC
, O
" O
came O
in O
advance O
of O
the O
annual O
Jerry MISC
Lewis MISC
Labour MISC
Day MISC
weekend O
telethon O
to O
raise O
money O
for O
muscular O
dystrophy O
research O
. O
Several O
hurdles O
must O
be O
overcome O
before O
the O
method O
is O
used O
in O
human O
trials O
. O
Nevertheless O
, O
" O
a O
treatment O
based O
on O
the O
new O
strategy O
.... O
may O
have O
the O
potential O
to O
benefit O
many O
patients O
, O
" O
the O
University LOC
of LOC
Pennsylvania LOC
Medical LOC
Centre LOC
said O
in O
a O
release O
. O
Muscular O
dystrophy O
is O
a O
fatal O
illness O
in O
which O
the O
body O
' O
s O
muscle O
tissue O
degenerates O
and O
is O
replaced O
by O
fat O
. O
Death O
strikes O
in O
early O
adulthood O
. O
Individuals O
with O
the O
disease O
have O
a O
non-working O
version O
of O
a O
gene ORG
responsible O
for O
producing O
a O
crucial O
muscle O
protein O
called O
dystrophin O
. O
In O
the O
study O
at O
the O
University LOC
' O
s O
Institute O
for O
Human MISC
Gene MISC
Therapy MISC
, O
researchers O
altered O
a O
common-cold O
virus O
to O
carry O
a O
version O
of O
the O
working O
dystrophin O
gene O
. O
The O
virus O
, O
which O
also O
was O
altered O
to O
minimise O
its O
susceptibility O
to O
the O
immune O
system O
, O
was O
then O
injected O
into O
the O
muscle O
cells O
of O
mice O
bred O
to O
lack O
dystrophin O
genes O
. O
In O
the O
experiment O
, O
between O
30 O
to O
40 O
percent O
of O
the O
muscle O
fibers O
in O
one O
group O
of O
mice O
produced O
dystrophin O
for O
two O
weeks O
before O
diminishing O
. O
Similar O
results O
had O
been O
obtained O
previously O
in O
test-tube MISC
cell O
cultures O
, O
but O
not O
in O
live O
animals O
, O
the O
university O
said O
. O
The O
university O
said O
methods O
are O
still O
needed O
to O
make O
enough O
of O
the O
altered O
virus O
to O
treat O
humans O
, O
to O
further O
decrease O
the O
immune-system O
response O
to O
the O
virus O
, O
and O
to O
deliver O
the O
virus O
to O
human O
muscle O
tissue O
. O
